message: I'll give you 4000, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills
You're not getting a better deal by trying to lowball me, Bob!
Meet me in the middle, Bob. You're getting a bigger share than I initially offered.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
I'm not budging much, Bob. This is my final offer.
